metadata.name: PUA - Process Hacker Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of Process Hacker based on binary metadata information (Image, Hash, Imphash, etc). Process Hacker is a tool to view and manipulate processes, kernel options and other low level options. Threat actors abused older vulnerable versions to manipulate system processes.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\processhacker_')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\processhacker.exe')) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('processhacker\\.exe', 'process hacker')) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('process hacker') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('process hacker') AND (contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('md5=68f9b52895f4d34e74112f3129b3b00d')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('md5=b365af317ae730a67c936f21432b9c71')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha1=a0bdfac3ce1880b32ff9b696458327ce352e3b1d')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha1=c5e2018bf7c0f314fed4fd7fe7e69fa2e648359e')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha256=d4a0fe56316a2c45b9ba9ac1005363309a3edc7acf9e4df64d326a0ff273e80f')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha256=bd2c2cf0631d881ed382817afcce2b093f4e412ffb170a719e2762f250abfea4')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=3695333c60dedecdcaff1590409aa462')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=04de0ad9c37eb7bd52043d2ecac958df'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of Process Hacker based on binary metadata information (Image, Hash, Imphash, etc). Process Hacker is a tool to view and manipulate processes, kernel options and other low level options. Threat actors abused older vulnerable versions to manipulate system processes.

metadata.objective: False positive: While sometimes 'Process Hacker is used by legitimate administrators, the execution of Process Hacker must be investigated and allowed on a case by case basis References: https://processhacker.sourceforge.io/, https://www.crowdstrike.com/blog/falcon-overwatch-report-finds-increase-in-ecrime/
